articles.author: Ben Kerry
articles.title: Xbox's Phil Spencer 'Excited' To Bring First Party Game To PlayStation Plus - Pure Xbox
articles.description: The Xbox-developed title comes to PS Plus in March
articles.content:
Xbox may be struggling to strike a deal with Sony over Microsoft's Activision Blizzard deal, but it doesn't seem to be stopping other agreements going ahead between the two gaming rivals.
During yes… [+1174 chars]
